name: Misconduct
description:
Dear colleagues, An individual worker is causing considerable anxiety and stress in our workplace. This individual is a bully who's toxic, destructive, and harmful. Such behavior is completely unacceptable. WAAO is an employee organized community dedicated to remove toxicities in workplaces. We will take on the responsibility to address this issue.  Onboarding Cheatsheet

Type “ls", “cd” to navigate the file system

Type “cat [file name]” to read files

Type “scan” to discover new machines on the same network and use “connect [ip]” to connect to them

You can always use “help” to learn more about the commands

Credits

Shader - Ahopness

SFX - cyberleaf

Cover art - Dalle2

Apology: there is a known issue that might cause the game to be unplayable in some browsers. Please download the executable and play locally if error occurs.
